com.google.android.glass.TMM

Class SelectCardActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.google.android.glass.TMM.SelectCardActivity

  • public class SelectCardActivity
extends Activity
    The Class SelectCardActivity. This activity displays either a waiting screen for the user while the DB is synchronized, or displays a cardscrolladapter. The user then uses the adapter to learn more about the card items for the thing that they are looking at.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      A reference to the parent application.

      Flag indicating whether the cards are ready for display by this activity.

      The position of the last card selected, if known.
      private SelectCardScrollAdapter mAdapter
      The SelectCardScrollAdapter used to render the cards in the proper format.
      private AudioManager mAudioManager
      The audio manager used to provide audio feedback to the user in response to user actions.
      private GestureDetector mDetector
      The GestureDetector that handles user input while this activity is running.
      private SliderView mIndeterm
      The indeterminate slider displayed while the cards are not yet ready to be viewed.
      private BroadcastReceiver mMessageReceiver
      The broadcast message receiver for received Intents for the "cards_loaded" event.
      private CardScrollView mView
      The CardScrollView used to display the cards in sequential order.

      The Constant TAG.

    • Field Detail

      • EXTRA_SELECTED_ID

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SELECTED_ID
        The Constant EXTRA_SELECTED_ID. This is used for intent extra passing. This maps to the String UUID of the card so that each activity my access it from the DB directly
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_SELECTED_POS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SELECTED_POS
        The Constant EXTRA_SELECTED_POS. This is used for intent extra passing. Designed to map to the position of the selected card from the SelectCardActivity so that when the user returns to it, the card they just tapped on is in focus.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CARDS_READY_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String CARDS_READY_KEY
        The Constant CARDS_READY_KEY. Used in intent passing to contain the status of the synchronization process, either true for completed or false for not completed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_POS

        private static final int DEFAULT_POS
        The Constant DEFAULT_POS. If the previous position of the cardscrollview cannot be determined from the intent, then this specified the default card position to display initially.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_SWIPE_DOWN

        private static final int KEY_SWIPE_DOWN
        The Constant KEY_SWIPE_DOWN. Used to handle the backwards compatibility for the swipe down action used to dismiss views in glass.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TAG

        public static final java.lang.String TAG
        The Constant TAG. Used for the Android debug logger.
